about_the_game:
Here comes the soundtrack for the second Touhou fan game "Kubinashiri Recollection", starring Sekibanki !
There are over 40 songs in total, including songs from the game, unused songs, bonus tracks, and more!
The soundtrack includes songs from the game as well as unused songs and bonus tracks, for a total of over 40 songs!
Please enjoy the many songs that color the mysterious adventures of Sekibanki !

short_description: The soundtrack of "Kubinashiri Collection", a Touhou fan game starring Sekibanki ! It contains a total of 45 songs, including some additional ones to the Touhou arrangements used in the game!
